stories.text:
It's my favorite feature of this year thus far (since nothing else has happened yet).

Verification (besides glancing at the nearest calendar): https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/twosday-2022/

I wonder what small fun thing(s) we could do to note its passing. It's as obscure as 1234567890 day (in 2009) was, but still a cute coincidence that I reckon is worth noting.
stories.title: Tell HN: The 22nd of February this year (22/2/2022) will be a Tuesday (Twos-day)
Bank of Mexico Plans to Launch Digital Currency by 2024

stories.text:
As Paul Graham wrote in his essay "Why nerds are unpopular", it is hard for us tech oriented people to build a great social life. Because our minds constantly revolve around tech and science.

Has anyone here ever made good progress in connecting with other people?

If so, which approaches or resources were helpful to you?
stories.title: Ask HN: Nerds of HN, did you overcome loneliness?
Opera to integrate Handshake for blockchain-based, decentralized domain naming
Decay: A real time experience made in godot engine
